title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Beat eggs with parmesan.
Combine spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture.
Serve with extra parmesan and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a buttery tomato gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 2 hours.
Grill chicken until cooked.
Prepare sauce with onion and tomato.
Combine chicken with sauce and simmer 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Crispy toast topped with smashed avocado, olive oil, and seasonings.
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden.
Mash avocado with salt and pepper.
Spread avocado on toast.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle red pepper flakes.
Serve immediately.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic chewy chocolate chip cookies with a golden crust.
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Mix butter and sugar until creamy.
Add eggs and vanilla, mix well.
Fold in flour and chocolate chips.
Spoon onto baking sheet and bake 12-15 minutes.
